extendedInfo.description: The new Ambush Zombie has arrived for Halloween!The zombies are more tough and hungry so you have to find the right strategy to exterminate them all.You must have good reflexes because now you must pay attention to the innocent people.Use the slow mode to  kill the zombies with ease.Possibility to use the rocket launcher to eliminate all threats that are in front of you.The goal is to increase your score and be the best killer on Ambush Zombie.Share your score on the Internet and try to stay in the world ranking.If you agree, your location is detected automatically to display the flag of your country in the international scores table.âââ Game Features âââ â¢ Adrenaline rush guaranteed â¢ Scary Music  â¢ Unique gaming experience â¢ Great Graphics and Animations  â¢ Extremely addictive

reviews.title: Moody
reviews.comment: This is an unfair rating cause the game is good. But I have to make the point, don\'t be nearly great but then glitch and crash. Apparently if you shoot someone with a shotgun 20 times they don\'t die, do the devs want to meet up and test this theory?
reviews.author: mike smith

reviews.title: Loves it
reviews.comment: I love the Santa zombie ambush game. I love this one more. Good job adding people,bats and rolling heads. Can\'t get enough.
reviews.author: Stephanie Cortez

reviews.title: MYKE, HTC 4g lte
reviews.comment: FREAKEN AWESOME !!!!!! I read Sum of da comments & went 4 it, guys great game, commenters- thanks gud job on da ratin...   I played it once & had 2 get back here & rate it , wen I wuz playin I saw a non zombie runnin & screamin, so now imma go back & see if I\'m able 2 shoot him 2 :-) ... An absolute download, now Im gonna go     F_*k Sh:*t up .........out
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: It\'s ok..
reviews.comment: Love the idea that instead of joy sticks they used tap shooting, but it needs a little tweek because it\'s not that responsive.. The graphics could use a little work too.. But it\'s free so 3 stars.. :)
reviews.author: Marco Polo

reviews.title: Great game
reviews.comment: Really cool !! Better have quick fingers to kill zombies hahaha
reviews.author: Daniel Onate

reviews.title: Too fast of play
reviews.comment: Originally when I played this game on my old phone it was slow. Idk if it\'s gotten updates since then but on my new phone it plays too fast. It\'s a great game, but it is too fast now. Can you fix it?
reviews.author: Gatling Paul

reviews.title: okay
